archetypes.name: Warrior
archetypes.description: Warriors are masters of martial combat, trained in the art of weapons and armor. They excel at direct confrontation, using their strength and endurance to overpower foes.

archetypes.name: Skirmisher
archetypes.description: Skirmishers are agile combatants who rely on speed, precision, and cunning rather than brute force. They strike from the shadows and exploit enemy weaknesses.
archetypes.playstyleSummary: High damage dealer with mobility focus

archetypes.name: Adept
archetypes.description: Adepts are versatile individuals who have honed practical skills and technical knowledge. They solve problems through ingenuity and resourcefulness.
archetypes.playstyleSummary: Versatile utility class with gadgets and tricks

archetypes.name: Mystic
archetypes.description: Mystics channel supernatural forces, whether arcane magic, divine power, or primal energies. They wield abilities beyond the reach of mundane warriors.
